text: Lyriel is a German band. The band plays folk rock. ==Members== *Jessica Thierjung (singer) *Linda (cello) *Oliver (guitar) *Joon (violin) *Marcus Fidorra (drums) *Martin (keyboard) *Sven (bass) Category:2000s establishments in Germany Category:2003 establishments in Europe category:German rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:Musicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:2000s German music groups Category:2010s German music groups
title: Lyriel
